channel.title: Rs2 server linux problem
channel.description:
Hello,
I have a rs2 317 server source downloaded and want to run it via a command line on my linux server.
I made a run.sh file with the following settings:
[b]#!/bin/bash
cd bin && java -Xmx1024M server[/b]
When i run it via the cmd i get this:
[URL=http://img62.imageshack.us/i/cmdr.jpg/][IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/6481/cmdr.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
Any help would be very apprecciated ;)
